public class SiteFilterBuilder
extends RecordFilterBuilderImpl

Builds a record filter that filters by site.

getSiteScope

public java.lang.String getSiteScope()
Gets the search's site scope. Null defaults to current. This property is ignored if the siteIds property is set. If the value isn't "current" or "all", the searchScope will be interpreted as a ShareableType ID.

Returns:
the siteScope

public void setSiteScope(java.lang.String pSiteScope)

pSiteScope - the siteScope to set

public java.lang.String[] determineSharableSiteIds(java.lang.String pScope)

buildRecordFilter

public java.lang.String buildRecordFilter()
Generates the record filter to filter the query based on the sites. Uses the siteIds property as a list of sites. If siteIds is null, siteScope is used. If siteScope is null or "current", filter for current site will be returned. If siteScope is "all", the filter will be set to use ALL sites. If siteScope is any, the filter will be set to ANY. If siteScope is "none", the filter will be set to NONE. All other values of siteScope will be used as a ShareableType id. The list of sites sharing that id will be used to filter the query. If no sites are found sharing that ShareableType id with the current site, the query will be filtered to use ANY site. If includeInactiveSites is false, the site list will be filtered to only contain active sites. This filtering will occur if the sites property is used or if the siteScope is "any" or a shareable id.

Returns:
the record filter string.

filterSiteList

public java.lang.String[] filterSiteList(java.lang.String[] pSites)
Filters the site array used in generateSiteFilter(). This method is called when the sites property is set or a ShareableType id is used to get a list of sites. If includeInactiveSites is false, all inactive sites will be removed from the list. Also, if includeInactiveSites is false, this method will be called for a scope of ANY.

Parameters:
pSites - The array of site ids
Returns:
The filtered site id array
